title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Get ready to take your frisbee game to the next level with the TOSY Flying Disc! This innovative disc features 36 or 360 LEDs that can display an incredible 16 million colors, making it 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market. With smart modes, motion sensors for auto light-up, and a rechargeable battery that lasts up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of play, this disc is perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.

Not only is the TOSY Flying Disc durable and waterproof, but it also meets professional ultimate standards, ensuring a long, straight, and precise flight every time. Whether you're looking for a cool gift for Christmas, birthdays, or camping trips, this disc is sure to impress men, boys, teens, and kids alike. Don't miss out on the fun - get your hands on the TOSY Flying Disc today!

This flying disc features 16 million color RGB LEDs with options for 36 or 360 LEDs, making it extremely bright and eye-catching. The smart modes allow for customizable brightness levels and timer settings, while the motion sensors automatically light up the disc for added convenience.

Not only is the TOSY Flying Disc rechargeable with a quick 30-minute charge time, but it also provides up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of match play. The durable design and waterproof construction ensure that this disc can withstand any adventure or game you throw its way. Perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes, this disc is a game-changer for any outdoor activity.

Don't miss out on the ultimate flying disc experience with the TOSY Flying Disc. Get yours today and take your fun to the next level!
